page.title: Retrieve identifiers for a series of variants.

header.title: /alleles
header.subtitle: Retrieve identifiers for a series of variants.

blocks.data: This POST request provides a way to retrieve information for one or more variants.

file.description: Must provide the payload type. Possible options are: hgvs, vcf, or, ca

blocks.data:
##fileformat=VCFv4.1
##contig=<ID=chr17,assembly=GRCh37>
#CHROM      POS   ID    REF   ALT   QUAL  FILTER      INFO
chr17   43009069        .       G       C       59      PASS    DB
chr17   43009090        .       G       T       59      PASS    DB
chr17   43009126        .       AG      A       60      PASS    DB
